titles.title: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act
State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act
To amend title 1, United States Code, to eliminate any Federal policy on the definition of marriage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act - Amends the Defense of Marriage Act to repeal the statutory definition of "marriage" as meaning only a legal union between one man and one woman as husband and wife, and of "spouse" as referring only to a person of the opposite sex who is a husband or a wife.
